00020     SEFormatBmp::SEFormatBmp()
00021     {
00022         this->setObjectName("SEFormatBmp");
00023         m_logger = new Logger(this);
00024 
00025         m_encodeWidget = new OptionWidget();
00026         m_encodeWidget->setObjectName("EncodeWidget");
00027         m_decodeWidget = new OptionWidget();
00028         m_decodeWidget->setObjectName("DecodeWidget");
00029 
00030         connect(m_encodeWidget, SIGNAL(optionHasChanged()), this, SLOT(optionHasChanged()));
00031     }
00032 
00033     SEFormatBmp::~SEFormatBmp()
00034     {
00035         delete m_encodeWidget;
00036         delete m_decodeWidget;
00037         delete m_logger;
00038     }

00065     QPointer<Image> SEFormatBmp::encodeImage(QPointer<Image> img, bool dontDuplicate)
00066     {
00067         // m_logger->debug("encodeImage");
00068         return updateImage(img, m_encodeWidget, dontDuplicate);
00069     }
00070 
00071     QPointer<Image> SEFormatBmp::decodeImage(QPointer<Image> img, bool dontDuplicate)
00072     {
00073         // m_logger->debug("decodeImage");
00074         return updateImage(img, m_decodeWidget, dontDuplicate);
00075     }
00076 
00077     QPointer<Image> SEFormatBmp::updateImage(QPointer<Image> img, OptionWidget* w, bool dontDuplicate)
00078     {
00079         QPointer<Image> imgBMP;
00080         if (dontDuplicate)
00081         {
00082             imgBMP = new ImageBMP(img); // don't copy image data
00083         }
00084         else
00085         {
00086             imgBMP = new ImageBMP(*img); // duplicate image into a new one
00087         }
00088 
00089         ImageBMP* newImage = ((ImageBMP*)imgBMP.data());
00090         newImage->setNbBits(w->nbBits());
00091         newImage->setColorUsed(w->isRedUsed(), w->isGreenUsed(), w->isBlueUsed());
00092         newImage->setDistribution(w->distribution());
00093         newImage->setHeaderPosition(w->headerPosition());
00094 
00095         return imgBMP;
00096     }
00097

00099     {
00100         return QString("BMP");
00101     }

00105         return true;

00109     {
00110         return true;
